96. $\cfrac{(x-2)(y-1)(y-2x)}{x-1}=0\Leftrightarrow \begin{cases}\left[\begin{array}{l}x=2,\\ y=1,\\ y=2x.\end{array}\right.\\ x\neq1.\end{cases}$
